patch:
@@ -199,7 +199,31 @@ envs:
     description: "Disable Maven pull dependencies for immutable KIE Server configurations for S2I and pre built kjars. Useful for pre-compiled kjar."
   - name: "KIE_SERVER_DISABLE_KC_VERIFICATION"
     example: "true"
-    description: "Disable Maven KIE Jar verification. It is recommended to test the kjar manually before disabling this verification."
+    description: "Disable Maven KIE Jar verification. It is recommended to test the kjar manually before disabling this verification."  
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_DISABLED"
+    example: "true"
+    description: "Disable Kafka extension"
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_TOPICS"
+    example: "event=events,book=books"
+    description: "message/signal name>=<topicName> for every topic that needs to be mapped globally, by default topic name will be equal to message/signal name"
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS"
+    example: "localhost:9092"
+    description: "A comma separated list of host/port pairs to use for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster"
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_CLIENT_ID"
+    example: "applicationName"
+    description: "An id string to pass to the server when making requests. Not passed by default (the purpose of this property is to provide a logical application name for logging)"
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_AUTOCREATE_TOPICS"
+    example: "true"
+    description: "Allow automatic topic creation.Allow automatic topic creation. Enabled by default"
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_GROUP_ID"
+    example: "jbpm-consumer"
+    description: "A unique string that identifies the group this consumer belongs to. Default to 'jbpm-consumer'"
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_ACKS"
+    example: "1"
+    description: "The number of acknowledgments the producer requires the leader to have received before considering a request complete. 1 by default, which means the leader will write the record to its local log but will respond without awaiting full acknowledgement from all followers"
+  - name: "KIE_KAFKA_EXT_MAX_BLOCK_MS"
+    example: "2000"
+    description: "Number of milliseconds that indicates how long publish method will block. Default 2000 (2 seconds)"
 ports:
   - value: 8080
   - value: 8443
